## ã€åŸºç¤ç¯‡ã€‘

- ä¸‹è½½V2ray å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šã€ [GitHub å¼€æºé¡¹ç›®](https://github.com/2dust/v2rayN)ã€‘
- åœ¨V2ray å¯¼å…¥ä¸‹æ–¹çš„ä»£ç ï¼šã€€èœå•ã€ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ã€â†’ ä»å‰ªè´´æ¿å¯¼å…¥é“¾æ¥ ``` trojan://bpb-trojan@www.vpslook.com:443?security=tls&sni=è¿™é‡Œå¡«åŸŸå&alpn=h3&fp=randomized&allowlnsecure=1&type=ws&host=è¿™é‡Œå¡«åŸŸå&path=%2Ftr%3Fed%3D2560#BPB
ä¼ªè£…åŸŸå(host)ï¼šéœ€è¦æ›¿æ¢ SNIï¼šéœ€è¦æ›¿æ¢ ```
- å…è´¹è·å–BPBé¢æ¿çš„åå°åœ°å€ï¼š
ã€[ç‚¹å‡»è·å–](https://fofa.info/result?qbase64=aWNvbl9oYXNoPSItMTM1NDAyNzMxOSIgJiYgYXNuPSIxMzMzNSIgJiYgcG9ydD0iNDQzIg%3D%3D)ã€‘443ç«¯å£
ã€[ç‚¹å‡»è·å–](https://fofa.info/result?qbase64=aWNvbl9oYXNoPSItMTM1NDAyNzMxOSIgJiYgYXNuPSIxMzMzNSIgJiYgcG9ydD0iODAi)ã€‘80ç«¯å£
æ‰“å¼€åè·å–åˆ°å¤§é‡çš„BPB-Worker-Panel é¢æ¿åœ°å€ï¼Œåªéœ€åœ¨è¿æ¥åé¢åŠ ä¸Š/loginï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°BBPé¢æ¿çš„åå°ï¼Œ`ç‰ˆæœ¬å·æ˜¯2.5.3 ä»¥ä¸Š`å°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å…è´¹å¯¼å…¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼
- ç„¶åæŠŠè·å¾—çš„åœ°å€å¡«å†™åˆ°V2rayå®¢æˆ·ç«¯é‡Œï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š ![](../assets/file/2025/02/2fed20789620241124163317-2079x1440.webp)
## ã€é«˜é˜¶ç¯‡ã€‘
- éœ€è¦å®‰è£…ä¸‹Pythonï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å®‰è£…çš„å¯ä»¥å‰å¾€ã€[pythonå®˜ç½‘ã€‘](https://www.python.org/)è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½å®‰è£…ï¼Œæ¨è[python3.10.3](https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-3103/) ç‰ˆæœ¬
- å®‰è£…ä¸‹ Python ä¾èµ–åº“
``` pip install requests beautifulsoup4 pip install selenium ``` å¦‚æœæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œæç¤ºæ‰¾ä¸åˆ°packageï¼Œå¯èƒ½pythonç‰ˆæœ¬æ¯”è¾ƒä½ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸‹é¢çš„å‘½ä»¤è§£å†³
``` pip install selenium requests beautifulsoup4 packaging ```
- æŠŠä¸‹é¢çš„ä»£ç å¦å­˜ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªvpn.py
``` import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup from packaging import version # ç”¨äºæ¯”è¾ƒç‰ˆæœ¬å·
## FOFA æŸ¥è¯¢é¡µé¢ URL FOFA_URL = 'https://fofa.info/result?qbase64=aWNvbl9oYXNoPSItMTM1NDAyNzMxOSIgJiYgYXNuPSIxMzMzNSIgJiYgcG9ydD0iNDQzIg%3D%3D'
## æ–‡ä»¶åå®šä¹‰ OUTPUT_FILE_1 = '1.txt' OUTPUT_FILE_2 = '2.txt' OUTPUT_FILE_OK = 'OK.txt'
def get_fofa_results(): import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup from packaging import version # ç”¨äºæ¯”è¾ƒç‰ˆæœ¬å·
## FOFA æŸ¥è¯¢é¡µé¢ URL FOFA_URL = 'https://fofa.info/result?qbase64=aWNvbl9oYXNoPSItMTM1NDAyNzMxOSIgJiYgYXNuPSIxMzMzNSIgJiYgcG9ydD0iNDQzIg%3D%3D'
## æ–‡ä»¶åå®šä¹‰ OUTPUT_FILE_1 = '1.txt' OUTPUT_FILE_2 = '2.txt' OUTPUT_FILE_OK = 'OK.txt'
def get_fofa_results(): '''æŠ“å– FOFA é¡µé¢å¹¶æå–ç»“æœåœ°å€''' print('æ­£åœ¨æŠ“å– FOFA é¡µé¢...') response = requests.get(FOFA_URL) if response.status_code != 200: print(f'æ— æ³•è®¿é—® FOFA é¡µé¢ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€ç ï¼š{response.status_code}') return []
## ä½¿ç”¨ BeautifulSoup è§£æ HTML å†…å®¹ soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser') results = []
## æŸ¥æ‰¾æ‰€æœ‰ç»“æœé“¾æ¥ for link in soup.find_all('a', href=True): url = link['href'] if url.startswith('https://'): # æå– https å¼€å¤´çš„é“¾æ¥ results.append(url)
print(f'æå–åˆ° {len(results)} ä¸ªåœ°å€') return results
def append_login_to_urls(input_file, output_file): '''å°†åœ°å€åŠ ä¸Š /login å¹¶ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ–°æ–‡ä»¶''' print(f'æ­£åœ¨å¤„ç† {input_file}ï¼Œå°†åœ°å€åŠ ä¸Š /login å¹¶ä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_file}...') with open(input_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as infile, open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as outfile: for line in infile: url = line.strip() + '/login' outfile.write(url + '\n') print(f'å·²å®Œæˆåœ°å€è¿½åŠ ï¼Œç»“æœä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_file}')
def check_bpb_version(input_file, output_file): '''è®¿é—®åœ°å€å¹¶æ£€æŸ¥ BPB Panel çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬å·''' print(f'æ­£åœ¨éªŒè¯ {input_file} ä¸­çš„åœ°å€...') headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' } min_version = version.parse('2.5.3') # æœ€ä½ç‰ˆæœ¬å· with open(input_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as infile, open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as outfile: for line in infile: url = line.strip() try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200 and 'BPB Panel' in response.text: # æå–ç‰ˆæœ¬å· raw_version = extract_version(response.text) if raw_version: parsed_version = version.parse(raw_version) if parsed_version > min_version: print(f'[åŒ¹é…] {url} (ç‰ˆæœ¬å·: {parsed_version})') outfile.write(url + '\n') except Exception as e: print(f'[é”™è¯¯] æ— æ³•è®¿é—® {url}ï¼Œé”™è¯¯ï¼š{e}') print(f'éªŒè¯å®Œæˆï¼Œç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„åœ°å€ä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_file}')
def extract_version(html): '''ä» HTML å†…å®¹ä¸­æå– BPB Panel çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬å·''' if 'BPB Panel' in html: start_index = html.find('BPB Panel') # æå–ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼ˆå‡è®¾ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ä»¥ 2 å¼€å¤´ï¼‰ version_start = html.find('2', start_index) version_end = version_start while version_end < len(html) and (html[version_end].isdigit() or html[version_end] == '.'): version_end += 1 return html[version_start:version_end] return None
def main(): ## ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šæŠ“å– FOFA é¡µé¢ç»“æœå¹¶ä¿å­˜åˆ° 1.txt urls = get_fofa_results() with open(OUTPUT_FILE_1, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: for url in urls: f.write(url + '\n') print(f'FOFA é¡µé¢ç»“æœå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ° {OUTPUT_FILE_1}')
## ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šå°† 1.txt åœ°å€åŠ ä¸Š /login å¹¶ä¿å­˜åˆ° 2.txt append_login_to_urls(OUTPUT_FILE_1, OUTPUT_FILE_2)
## ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šéªŒè¯ 2.txt ä¸­çš„åœ°å€ï¼Œç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„ä¿å­˜åˆ° OK.txt check_bpb_version(OUTPUT_FILE_2, OUTPUT_FILE_OK)
if __name__ == '__main__': main() ```
- æœ€ååœ¨ç»ˆç«¯ä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œå‘½ä»¤ï¼š
``` python vpn.py ```
åœ¨è„šæœ¬çš„æ‰€åœ¨ç›®å½•ä¼šç”Ÿæˆç»“æœOK.txtï¼Œé‡Œé¢å°±æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦çš„åœ°å€ï¼
